title: Handle tool/session race condition in tracing plugin
Fix Honeycomb MCP browser opening on startup
Add TTL cleanup for tracing plugin internal Maps
Improve OpenCode Honeycomb telemetry for performance debugging and subagent tracking
description:
Improved Honeycomb telemetry plugin (v5.0.0) with:
- Fixed agent.name/agent.model propagation (no more 'pending' values)
- Added cost calculation from token counts using model-pricing.json config
- Improved trace propagation for subagents (proper parent-child linking)
- Added subagent type tracking on session spans
- Added session timing, tool sequencing, and cumulative token tracking
- Normalized span naming (session:main, agent:{type})
- Added plugin.version for tracking
close_reason: Superseded by more granular telemetry improvement tasks for v9.0

title: Code quality cleanup for tracing plugin (v8.5.0)
Add safe span operation wrappers to tracing plugin
Fix orphaned phase spans on early return paths
Production hardening - move debug attributes behind flag (v9.0.0)
